title: The Azathoth Cycle: Tales of the Blind Idiot God
description: Short stories by Edward Pickman Derby, Peter Cannon, Stephen M. Rainey, Henry Kuttner, Lin Carter, Ramsey Campbell, Thomas Ligotti, Richard L. Tierney, Gary Myers, Donald R. Burleson, C.J. Henderson, Stephen Studach, John Glasby, Allen Mackey and Robert M. Price.Contents:The Mad God: An Introduction to The Azathoth Cycle by Robert M. Price and Richard L. TierneyThe Last Night of Earth by Gary MyersThe Daemon-Sultan by Donald R. Burleson.Idiot Savant by C.J.
